website_summaries.verdict: While it might have a gaming-oriented pedigree, Razer's Hammerhead V2 is simply a good-sounding, affordable pair of earphones.
pros: Powerful bass response with proper high-mid sculpting for balance

customer_reviews.title: Don't feel like 70 quid headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Short version these are among the most expensive (retail price), and worst headphones I've owned. The sound quality is good. However this is the only positive. The sound cancellation is basically non existent and lots of background noise bleeds through. The buds aren't very comfortable and none of the buds seem to be better or worse than the other. Plus the ear pieces feel very heavy. These two things make the headphones constantly feel like they're going to fall out. These headphones don't really feel like a 70 quid product and I'm glad I got mine for 30 in the Amazon Wearhouse deals, however at this price, I still feel I might have overpaid.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Camburn

customer_reviews.title: I guess...
customer_reviews.text: I support Razer, I really do. However these headphones weren't what I expected, the sound quality was great, but the earbuds were uncomfortable to the point where it was painful to wear them, I don't think these headphones are worth the price, they broke after 20 days of them arriving, it's a shame that they are so fragile, I would've loved to continue using them, despite the earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: xNerdii

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones! I use them as my daily drivers for walks to work and listening in the home. The bass is immense and the sound quality is second to none. I'm not an audio professional but as an average consumer, I would highly recommend these! My only issue is the buds don't seem to fit my ear that well. They do fall out quite a lot. However, it should be noted this happens with most of the in-ear headphones I use. Overall, I would highly recommend this product and I would never think of getting rid of mine!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Stadden

customer_reviews.title: Think its one of the best earphones I had so far
customer_reviews.text: Think its one of the best earphones I had so far. Yeah it might be not as good as other famous brands in quality of 'bass' but as a person who uses allot of different kinds of equipment such as windows PC, macbook, samsung s6 and iPad it works perfectly with all. So mic will work with all and all the remote options such as volume and answering calls. I may take one star away but in way of ability to work with different devices its one of the best on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail Oreshkin

customer_reviews.title: Great Earphones
customer_reviews.text: Great quality earphones. Use them when I go cycling and they don't fall out. Only complaint is that black on the earpiece has come off in places but i isn't a noticeable amount.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Silver

customer_reviews.title: Preferred the original hammerheads
customer_reviews.text: Compared the the older hammerhead pros these ones aren't as Great in my opinion. Previous headphones have lasted a year each time and these ones are proving to hold up well, however theyre more irritating on the ear since the back of it is larger and rubs against it but that stopped after a week. Antihero issue is that the volume controls don't work on the Google pixel but I believe that's an issue on the phones side cause they have a jack that's a lil bigger than usual. Overall these are pretty solid headphones though (also use for gaming; mmo's, fps, strategy, mobas etc)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sometimes doesn't feel very comfortable when take it on for a long time
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is still the same as the first version, But earbuds has been changes too much, sometimes doesn't feel very comfortable when take it on for a long time. Overall still worth for the prize.
customer_reviews.author: Irikixxx🥘🥘

customer_reviews.title: Use your money for better earphones.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these last minute for a lan event. I have used them for about a week for gaming and mousing and they aren't that good for the money i spend on them. I had a pair of sennheiser ones for 3 years and they were the best one I have ever used and they were 10 pounds more than these so would suggest going for a brand with good reputation.
customer_reviews.author: calvin

customer_reviews.title: Razer Hammerhead Pro V2 In-Ear Headset
customer_reviews.text: My grandson only wanted this make but have had a problem already with the ones bought at Xmas so he has are placement . will say as soon as I returned the faulty ones the new ones came quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Carol A. Fosbrook

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of ear buds for gaming!
customer_reviews.text: These seem to have had a bad review - I can't say I have had the same experience. They are great headphones, I primarily use them for gaming. They fit my ears well, I don't have the same issues others have had. They come with a number of different 'ear plugs', so choose the ones that best suite you. Bass is great, however I don't use these for music, so can't comment too much on that. Great product - love the ear buds and flat straps.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy them
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted a few months and i cant get a refund so id stay away from these. Also the price dropped over 50% i wonder why that is ?
customer_reviews.author: Kappa

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality. A tad on the expensive side. I don’t know if they are anti tangle but they don’t really tangle like other headphones do. Also a nice bright colour so you can find them easy. Pretty comfortable for in ear headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Am not satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting a brand new pair but recieved a used one without the instrustions or anything other than the earphones in the box. Had issues when plugged in, couldnt connect properly and had to adjust a few times to hear the song clearly. After a few days the right side also couldnt connect and had to be adjusted to hear the music.
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln Lim

customer_reviews.title: Mic not great.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for music and audio but the mic quality really isn’t worth the money. I bought for whatsapp and discord and people can barely hear me. Not great.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Tinny, uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality nowhere near as good as the previous ranges, also extremely uncomfortable to wear for longer than 30mins
customer_reviews.author: Tim Emery

customer_reviews.title: volume no good too low
customer_reviews.text: fell apart after a short while volume is not good either
customer_reviews.author: Lee and Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great audio, but slightly uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great finish & really good audio quality. Heavy on the ears & can get uncomfortable over long periods of time (4+ hours)
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Left ear bud broke within 2 months, was extemely careful but still broke, very disapointed - would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Buy them if you are a Razer fanboy...
customer_reviews.text: There are probably way better products to buy than this, which has no mic. I use it for my mobile phone to listen to spotify. But there is no mic which is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: broken with in 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I got these hoping they would live up to the razor name, I have many other razor products that are awesome. But sadly this one broke within 3 weeks. I really liked then when they worked but one ear piece has stopped working. don't recommend
customer_reviews.author: bryn

customer_reviews.title: 2 pairs both broke
customer_reviews.text: ive had 2 pairs of these earphones, 1st lasted 9 month and the second only 4. both times one ear phone has lost all sound and the other shortly after. the 1st pair were still in warranty so got 2nd for free but still not impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Item is ok. But did not give quality of sound.
customer_reviews.author: Mielbri

customer_reviews.title: Not the best...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are not worth the huge price on them. For what they are, i'd say general cost should be £30. The sound is ok, not great. They wires are a nightmare no matter what precautions to take for them not to tangle up. The earbuds arent comfortable. I've had mine since Oct 2016 and the left ear has already packed in. Pending a return/replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Cable is very "rubbery" and so doesn't like going into my pocket
customer_reviews.text: Cable is very "rubbery" and so doesn't like going into my pocket. other than this the product is good for a razer product.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hype of RAZER!
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t recommend this product for regular gamers as the ear pieces aren’t as comfy, I had it for 6 months and I have to say, you could buy similar quality earphones for a cheaper price. You can use it for ps4 parties.
customer_reviews.author: Salim

customer_reviews.title: Hate to love 'em
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality? Amazing. Build quality? Terrible. I've had several pairs of these earphones, each broken is a weird way related to the cables.
customer_reviews.author: Stone

customer_reviews.title: Typical Razer. High price, low quality.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality doesn't match the price at all. There is always a fient buzzing in both of the pairs I have owned. The textured metal on the buds are agony after a couple of hours, and both pairs I've had have broken within 3-4 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of earphones
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, nice added extras, like a carry case, but I wish that all of it was that amazing Aluminum, many of the black parts are rubbery plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Alex H.

customer_reviews.title: Really decent but not giving a 3.5mm Jack splitter is cheap...
customer_reviews.text: The product it self is awesome, but they really should have included the Audio Jack splitter, which you need on and off depending on where you wanna use the Headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Munir Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but ear buds didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: Ear buds that came with didn't fit my ears, had to buy another brand. Sound quality increased tenfold when I had the new ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Parker

customer_reviews.title: Not recognized by Razer
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to register this product on the Razewr website due to unrcognizable serial number and so would not have Razer's warrenty. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: The sound is pretty good and the base as well. I liked that the give you some extra ear buds and the case. Razer is always the best
customer_reviews.author: Ioannis

customer_reviews.title: Good but 1 issue
customer_reviews.text: The earphones are good but the wire where you plug into the computer is kind of broken, unwed to turn it around so the audio comes out properly. But when it’s working it’s good
customer_reviews.author: Christian D.

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Broke after 2 months of use, i have a razer keyboard, mouse and headset which all work fine however this product is broken
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: Better than any pair of Beats I have had.
customer_reviews.text: Very good price for the quality, they're better than any pair of earphones I have ever had. Would 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula

customer_reviews.title: I bought this product once and the left headphone came ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product once and the left headphone came broke so i asked for a refund and bought a 2nd pair i used the 2nd pair for 1 month being extremely careful with them and then the audio jack broke
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Todd

customer_reviews.title: Needed to be stronger
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great but mine broke a week after they arrived and now it just cut out the music unless i hold it in a certain way so yeah great sound but not super durable
customer_reviews.author: coreydungate

customer_reviews.title: Would be good if not so fragile
customer_reviews.text: Break faster than the 1st version of these. Would be good if not so fragile. These lasted me less than a month. They don't last long if you have to unplug regularly.
customer_reviews.author: razzy402

customer_reviews.title: The Sound quality is perfect really good for gaming as well but I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: The Sound quality is perfect really good for gaming as well but I bought 3 times and all the time THE LEFT SIDE STOPPED WORKING AFTER 3 or 6 MONTHS ! Otherwise I was so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flat cables are a nice touch and sound quality is good
customer_reviews.text: Flat cables are a nice touch and sound quality is good. In ear grommets not the best fit and way too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: john t irons

customer_reviews.title: nice product, but after 2 months of using the ...
customer_reviews.text: nice product, but after 2 months of using the headset, they no longer work. So, 60 quid for 2 months? Not good. In fact, dreadful. Has now made me rething my decision to buy any further Razer product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: One side stopped working after one month Seller won't respond to replacement requests.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas Stanislovaitis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I do like them the only problem is they are really lauded but the Basse is low
customer_reviews.author: Damian Lesniewski

customer_reviews.title: These sound great but the wiring is bad
customer_reviews.text: These sound great but the wiring is bad. It doesnt work on my phone on both the original and the replacment I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great noise cancelling ear phones. Cannot hear anything except for tge music!

customer_reviews.title: Rendering itself useless.
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of use they just died, the right ear went first then the left. Rendering itself useless.
customer_reviews.author: andrearooney

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointing since the v1 version of the headphones I ...
customer_reviews.text: Broke about a month after I had them. Pretty disappointing since the v1 version of the headphones I brought lasted me 2 years before one of the earphones gave out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is excellent, however I have now had replacement earphones due ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is excellent , however I have now had replacement earphones due to the first ones stop working and now my second pair have broken. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: be cautious!!!!
customer_reviews.text: feel like they're fake bought 11 months ago and left driver doesn't not work tried to contact Razer but don't have a serial number it was covered with a sticker which i removed to find no number at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and quality
customer_reviews.text: Used for gaming and provide excellent sound and quality for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Dying by itself
customer_reviews.text: Actually the best headphones that i ever used to, btw it's my third order cuz after 1 month it stops working.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones but they broke after 4 months use. Not happy, would not recommend at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had these earphones for 2 months and they now don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Had these earphones for 2 months and they now don't work no music coming earpiece does anyone know how i stand for replacements thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got these headphones as a friend recommended it to me
customer_reviews.text: I got these headphones as a friend recommended it to me. Once I used the earphones after 2 months the left ear piece would not emit any sound.
customer_reviews.author: Kasim

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: They have broken after a month of use ... no sound!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: really good headphones for the price but they broke a little after a month.
customer_reviews.author: afshin mazari

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in may 2017 and now not working
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality but very poor build
customer_reviews.text: I bought these earphones around 1 month ago with good sound quality and ok bass they do sound good but the design and build is very poor. Using these earphones regularly and always storing them in the provided case, the left earbud started playing up with the sound constantly dipping and always outputting less sound than the other, and because there is no warranty I am stuck with a broken pair of earphones. And on another note the eartips provided are not good for extended use as they fit poorly in the ear and start to irritate the inner ear after prolonged use. NOT WORTH THE MONEY !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not as goo as expected, considering the brand name, cable when folded affected the sound in one earphone and when tried to return the product didn’t get reply. Very disappointed as lost considering amount of money and no earphones .
customer_reviews.author: Crewzerka

customer_reviews.title: For gamers by gamers?
customer_reviews.text: Headphones are decent quality, but mine broke 2 weeks after purchase, left ear stopped working completely, since Razer boasts about its build quality which on average always falls short of the mark, I wasn't surprised at all. This is last product I will ever buy from them they've taken enough of my money over the years on various peripherals but there after sale customer service is terrible, they cant source anything from replacement headset covers or Mouse finger grips which just wear with time.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. R. Nolan

customer_reviews.title: It’s not what u see on amazon!!!
customer_reviews.text: You see the picture? You won’t get that, you will get them with no extension, and from there you see a microphone contact, you don’t have it also. Here is the picture with what you actually get. That long buds are painful.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian C.

customer_reviews.title: Two sets failed within days.
customer_reviews.text: Very, very poor quality. Original set replaced after two weeks due to complete failure of left side earbud. Second set failed in exactly the same way days after receiving. Tested on three devices to make sure. Extremely poor and very disappointed. Will not be buying another Razer product.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. I. C. Simpkins

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was prefect and what I expected but just stopped working a half a month in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do razer ever get better ! (apple classic earphones are betterlol)
customer_reviews.text: Does razer ever get better ! So this is like the 4th item i've bought from them and so far so worse. Rubber on the earphone is sort of glued and it's came of after what a week of having this item. Amazon, made me buy 2 of these for some reason. So yeah very crappy quality for' "70"GBP freaking earphones other items that broke a week after buying from razer , Chroma keyboard side usb inputs don't work , blackshark quality is completely messed up and is not great , only one i like from razer is the oldschool deathadder
customer_reviews.author: Jarrad M.

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality. Save your money and don't buy this piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this piece of garbage.After 2 months of using my mic just broke. This so called gaming headset is just like other razer products-- fancy looking but very bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Razer Hammerhead V2 In-Ear Headphones
product_meta.description:
The Razer Hammerhead has been re-designed from the ground up with an all-new body design and flat-style cables to further complement the mobile gamer in you. Experience superior acoustic clarity and improved bass performance through the upgraded extra-large 10 mm dynamic drivers, over 20% larger than the original Razer Hammerhead, featuring an optimized inner acoustics chamber. The Razer Hammerhead complements every style while retaining its signature durability factor. Designed with a high quality body to enable improved acoustics, the new flat-style cables also facilitate fuss-free mobility and easy storage while you're on the move.

BOX CONTAINS
1 x Earphones
Small, medium and large ear-tips
Carrying case
feature_bullets: 10mm Extra-Large Dynamic Drivers for Stellar Audio Fidelity
All-New Body Design with Flat-Style Cables for Toughness on the Go
Enhanced Passive Noise Isolation with Bi-Flange Tips

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars325 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
